{autor} {sep} {icon_github} {icon_twitter} {icon_instagram} ", "{icon_mastodon} {icon_bsky} {usuario}" ) ``` ::: ## Datos ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2026, 03) apod <- tuesdata$apod ``` ::: ## Procesamiento Me interesa... ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} browseURL(sample(subset(apod, media_type == "image")$url, 1)) sample(apod$explanation, 1) apod |> filter(str_detect(explanation, "Argentina")) |> slice_sample(n = 1) |> pull(url) |> browseURL() d <- apod |> filter(str_detect(explanation, "Argentina")) |> select(copyright, date, url) |> mutate(id = str_pad(row_number(), width = 2, pad = "0")) pwalk( select(d, id, url), \(id, url) { download.file( url = url, destfile = paste0("tidytuesday/2026/.semana_03/", id, ".jpg"), mode = "wb" ) } ) download.file( url = d$url[1], paste0("tidytuesday/2026/.test/", d$id[1], ".jpg"), mode = "wb" ) library(magick) magick::image_read( path = list.files("tidytuesday/2026/.test/", full.names = TRUE)[4] ) |> image_frame(geometry = "30x30+5+5") |> image_extent('1000x1000', color = 'pink') |> magick::image_annotate( text = "TEST", gravity = "northwest", location = "+10+10" ) ``` ::: ## Figura Figura. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} g <- ggplot() ``` ::: Guardo. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ggsave( plot = g, filename = "tidytuesday/2026/semana_03.png", width = 30, height = 30, units = "cm" ) browseURL("tidytuesday/2026/semana_03.png") ``` :::
